name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 3rd Generation Live#きゅるるん大作戦〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜【DAY1】 [cgvMVU2sO_U]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Title card with the concert logo and the members of Hololive 3rd Generation.
Attention screen displaying concert etiquette and rules regarding lighting and cheering.
Slideshow displaying merchandise and goods information for the concert.
A slideshow loop showcasing handwritten messages and illustrations from fans.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
